flawed_nl_solution:
After losing some socks, Caroline has 40 - 4 = <<40-4=36>>36 pairs of socks
Caroline donates 36 * (2/3) = <<36*2/3=24>>24 pairs of socks to the thrift store
After donating some socks, Caroline has 36 - 24 = <<36-24=12>>12 pairs of socks remaining
After getting new socks, Caroline has 12 + 10 + 3 = <<12+10+3=29>>29 pairs of socks

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 29. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
